name: planwell
title: PlanWell
description: Companion extension for PlanWell - the markdown-native teacher planning app. View today's classes, upcoming events, and todos. Requires a PlanWell vault (planwellmd.com).
author: Raynold

preferences.name: vaultPath
preferences.title: PlanWell Vault Path
preferences.description: Path to your PlanWell vault folder

preferences.name: externalEditor
preferences.title: External Editor
preferences.description: App to open markdown files (e.g., TextEdit, Obsidian, VS Code)

preferences.name: obsidianVaultName
preferences.title: Obsidian Vault Name
preferences.description: Exact vault name as shown in Obsidian's vault switcher (required if using Obsidian)

preferences.name: obsidianSubfolder
preferences.title: Obsidian Subfolder
preferences.description: Subfolder/symlink name within vault (leave empty if vault root is your data folder)
